```{r setup, include=FALSE}
renv::restore()
conflictRules("git2rdata", exclude = c("pull", "meta"))
conflictRules("tidyr", exclude = "extract")
conflictRules("knitr", exclude = "spin")
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(purrr)
library(sf)
library(terra)
library(n2khab)

```

**Note: this is a bookdown project, supposed to be run from within the `src/update_watersurfaces_refpoints` subfolder. You can use the `update_watersurfaces_refpoints.Rproj` RStudio project file in this subfolder to run it.**
